house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1978 has 4 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace, storage space.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Fine Properties RE/MAX Fine Properties
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Pantry, Storage Space
